CustomField.description: Determines if this file is OCR compatible based on the file's size and mime type.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( OR( litify_docs__File_Type__c = "application/vnd.ms-excel", litify_docs__File_Type__c = "application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet", litify_docs__File_Type__c = "application/vnd.ms-excel.sheet.macroenabled.12", litify_docs__File_Type__c = "application/vnd.ms-excel.sheet.macroEnabled.12", litify_docs__File_Type__c = "application/vnd.ms-excel.sheet.binary.macroenabled.12", litify_docs__File_Type__c = "application/vnd.ms-excel.addin.macroenabled.12", litify_docs__File_Type__c = "application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.template", litify_docs__File_Type__c = "application/vnd.ms-excel.template.macroenabled.12", litify_docs__File_Type__c = "application/vnd.ms-powerpoint", litify_docs__File_Type__c = "application/vnd.ms-powerpoint.addin.macroenabled.12", litify_docs__File_Type__c = "application/vnd.ms-powerpoint.presentation.macroenabled.12", litify_docs__File_Type__c = "application/vnd.ms-powerpoint.slide.macroenabled.12", litify_docs__File_Type__c = "application/vnd.ms-powerpoint.slideshow.macroenabled.12", litify_docs__File_Type__c = "application/vnd.ms-powerpoint.template.macroenabled.12", litify_docs__File_Type__c = "application/vnd.oasis.opendocument.presentation", litify_docs__File_Type__c = "application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.presentationml.slideshow", litify_docs__File_Type__c = "application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.presentationml.template", litify_docs__File_Type__c = "application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.presentationml.presentation", litify_docs__File_Type__c = "application/rtf", litify_docs__File_Type__c = "text/plain", litify_docs__File_Type__c = "text/csv", litify_docs__File_Type__c = "text/html", litify_docs__File_Type__c = "application/pdf", litify_docs__File_Type__c = "application/msword", litify_docs__File_Type__c = "application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document", litify_docs__File_Type__c = "application/vnd.ms-word.document.macroenabled.12", litify_docs__File_Type__c = "application/vnd.ms-word.template.macroEnabled.12", litify_docs__File_Type__c = "application/vnd.ms-word.template.macroenabled.12", litify_docs__File_Type__c = "application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.template", litify_docs__File_Type__c = "application/vnd.wordperfect", litify_docs__File_Type__c = "application/vnd.ms-outlook", litify_docs__File_Type__c = "message/rfc822", litify_docs__File_Type__c = "image/bmp", litify_docs__File_Type__c = "image/png", litify_docs__File_Type__c = "image/jpeg", litify_docs__File_Type__c = "image/tiff"), litify_docs__File_Size__c < 5 * 1024 * 1024 * 1024) , true, false)
CustomField.label: OCR Compatible
